title: Between the Scenes - Paul Manafort's PDF Predicament
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Paul Manafort's PDF Predicament
description:
Trevor talks about how a botched PDF redaction exposed former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort's shady dealings with Russia.
